name: Breathe (itch) (Aswin Behera)
description:
Breathe : The Interactive Experience or top-down evade them'll frantic survival. You decide.

The idea for this game came from the ongoing pandemic, where patients with severe afflictions were struggling with their SpO2 or Oxygen levels.

This game tries to mimic the tense situation of survival, whereby breathing is all you can do to survive. Growth in the Oxygen levels. Hence, the name BREATHE.

Game Mechanics:
- WASD  for movement.

- Space Key to Breathe/Interact with the Lotuses that are to be collected in the game. Plus, who knows what may happen when this is used to interact with the bots.

- Shift Key to Dash. (A necessary survival tool to evade the bots in te game and their killzone.)

- Right mouse-click to activate the incognito mode. This allows the player to hide themselves from the Bots searchlight. 

Game Objective:
Collect all the Lotus scattered throught the map, thereby increasing the Max SpO2 levels of the patient/character you control.
